root.name: Men in Black 2: The Series
root.description: OverviewMen in Black 2: The Series is an action game developed by David A. Palmer Productions and published by Crave Entertainment for the Game Boy Color platform.GameplayMen in Black 2: The Series is an action/platformer in which the goal of each level is to collect certain items or defeat a boss character. Both Agent J and Agent K are selectable characters. Both of the playable characters play exactly the same, and only look slightly different.The controls consist of a jump button and a shoot button. The player can also duck by pressing down on the D-Pad or shoot up by pressing up at the same time as the shoot button.
